slide.title: Integrating with existing Code
slide.blurb: Key differences between Web/Command Line code and GUI's

list.bullet: Memory Resident (no sessions or single transaction)

slide.example: <?php $this->ui->updateProgress(); $result = $this->ui->prompt('Are You sure you want to do that?') ?>

list.bullet: Updating GUI requires letting the GUI take over application
You need to use callbacks for prompts or dialogs.
